pages.text: You can enchant your weaponry and armory at a regular enchanting table with the following powerful ancient enchantments:

pages.title: Blight
pages.text: Afflicts the target with Wither, Levitation and Weakness effects for (5 * level) seconds.$(br2)Applicable Equipment: Bows$(br)Max Level: 3

pages.title: Bloodletting
pages.text: Has a (15% * level) chance to cause blood essence to drop when hitting a target.$(br2)Applicable Equipment: All Weapons$(br)Max Level: 3

pages.title: Exude
pages.text: Heals you from Poison and Wither effects, heals you and extinguishes fire while you are burning.$(br2)Applicable Equipment: Armor$(br)Max Level: 1

pages.title: Hemorrhage
pages.text: Afflicts the target with the Bleeding effect, dealing periodic damage for (5 * level) seconds.$(br2)Applicable Equipment: All Weapons$(br)Max Level: 3

pages.title: Nourishment
pages.text: Decreases your hunger bar instead of health by the damage dealt to you.$(br2)Applicable Equipment: Armor$(br)Max Level: 1

pages.title: Soulsteal
pages.text: Has a (25% * level) chance to cause soul essence to drop when killing a target.$(br2)Applicable Equipment: All Weapons$(br)Max Level: 3
